list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Add basic GUI for temperature scale with submit button
- Implemented a Scale widget for selecting temperature values (100 to 0 degrees Celsius). - Added a Button widget to submit and display the selected temperature in the console. - Included event handling for the button using a `submit` function. - Ensured the main event loop (`mainloop`) runs the application.
